lexUnit.name: behave.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: act or conduct oneself in a specified way

sentence.text: ` This boy behaved in an underhand way , setting up situations so that he would n't get into trouble , but David would when he had left .

` If one of them starts behaving out of character , I know that something 's upsetting them .

During his three days of testimony Souter behaved with courtesy and tact , studiously avoiding giving the Democratic majority any reason to reject him .

The registrar was a dignified man who behaved with the correct degree of formality .
Koreans expect their statesmen to behave with calmness , even when questioned closely .

They behaved towards each other like a couple of newly-frozen ice-cubes .

` Now apologise and behave , or go and ride with your mother . "
